attributes.action: allow young people's idea to be expressed on this petition site instead of just stuffy old people's!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have seen time and again on this website that the petitions of people with ideas only constricting to younger people have been much more common than those from much more open minded young people.

I myself have had several serious petitions rejected for no reason, while pointless stuffy petitions banning hoodies and mp3 player volume limits live on. 

Are the e-petition all made up of sixty year olds that are purely ageist? This problem cannot go on!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
